pageContext.claim: “An expert mathematician concluded that the only explanation for the actual voting results in Arizona is that 100%, think of this, 130% of Democrats voted for candidate Biden. And a negative 30% voted for President Trump. Now, think of that. In order to get to the numbers, 130% of the voters -- that's a little tough to get, okay? -- had to vote for him; and minus 30 had to vote for me. And that gets you to 100% and nobody has 100% voting.”
pageContext.analysis: Shiva Ayyadura, who has engineering degrees from MIT, is a failed GOP Senate candidate in Massachusetts with a history of controversy. He claimed that a computer simulation of the votes in Maricopa County showed the result was only possible under a scenario that weighted all Democrat votes at 130% and Trump’s votes at –30%. Ayyadura also claims to have invented email as a 14-year-old student at Livingston High School in New Jersey.
